name: Global uniques
uniques: Requires establishing embassies to conduct advanced diplomacy
[-100]% unhappiness from the number of cities
[-1 Happiness] for every known Natural Wonder
[-4] Happiness from each type of luxury resource
[-100]% Culture cost of adopting new Policies
[+99999]% Culture cost of natural border growth [in all cities]
[1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Era.Wasteland] <when number of [Resource.Scientific Level] is less than [Resource.Scientific Research Point]> <upon turn end>
[1] Free Technologies <when number of [Resource.Scientific Level] is less than [Resource.Scientific Research Point]> <upon turn end>

Provides [1] [RN1] <for every [([turns] * 184 * [[Plains] Tiles] + [Gold] * 106 * [[Grassland] Tiles] + [Culture] * 178 * [[Plains] Tiles] + [Happiness] * 141 * [[City center] Tiles] + 213 * [[Barbarian encampment] Tiles]) % 1000]>

Provides [1] [RN2] <for every [([turns] * 34 + 59 * [[Barbarian encampment] Tiles] + [Gold] * 93 * [[Grassland] Tiles] + [Culture] * 46 * [[Plains] Tiles] + [Happiness] * 61 * [[Plains] Tiles] + 73 * [[Barbarian encampment] Tiles]) % 100]>
Triggers a [Event.1.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [0]> <upon turn start> <when above [5] [Culture]>
Triggers a [Event.2.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [1]> <upon turn start> <when above [10] [Culture]>
Triggers a [Event.3.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [2]> <upon turn start> <when above [15] [Culture]>
Triggers a [Event.4.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [3]> <upon turn start> <when above [20] [Culture]>
Triggers a [Event.5.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [4]> <upon turn start> <when above [25] [Culture]>
Triggers a [Event.6.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [5]> <upon turn start> <when above [30] [Culture]>
Triggers a [Event.7.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [6]> <upon turn start> <when above [35] [Culture]>
Triggers a [Event.8.Title] event <when number of [Event-driven] is equal to [7]> <upon turn start> <when above [40] [Culture]>
